Nightstrike::

Nightstrike landed and told to Megatron "Unit, Nighstrike report, My 
commander"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron/Wildrider/Speedbreaker/Beastbox/Sinnertwin/Motormaster
> 
> Wildrider and Speedbreaker both land on the ground, and cover their
> heads at the incoming weaponfire. An explosion then lands beside 
them,
> sending Wildrider sprawling. He dosent see his 
comerade. "Speedbreaker,
> where are you, good for nothing" he started to yell.
> 
> Motormaster landed a bit away, and spat, disgusted at the Maximals
> clebration. He transformed and rolled towards where the smoke was
> clearing. "Get him in" he said when he found Speedbreaker, and he 
opened
> his trailer. Wildrider picked him up and carried him in quickly, 
then
> started leaving, and heard Speedbreaker, "Bastich's wrecked my 
paint" or
> something like that. He leapt out, and transformed into his car 
mode,
> and roared off, as Motormaster closed his trailer and followed.
> 
> -------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> Sinnertwin swerved back and forth, avoiding a lot of projectiled, 
and
> continued on his path.
> 
> --------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> Megatron got out of Astroblast. "Well Astroblast, go and tell 
everyone
> to get repaired, we begin shortly" he said, as he waited for the 
rest of
> his troops to arrive.
